HcalTempModel.hh

00001 #ifndef HcalTempModel_h
00002 #define HcalTempModel_h 1
00003 
00004 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00005 #include <config.h>
00006 #endif
00007 
00008 #include <sstream>
00009 #include <stdexcept>
00010 #include <cstdlib>
00011 
00012 #include <lcio.h>
00013 #include <lccd.h>
00014 #include <EVENT/LCParameters.h>
00015 #include <EVENT/LCCollection.h>
00016 #include <EVENT/LCParameters.h>
00017 #include <TempModel.hh>
00018 #include "AhcSlowReadoutModBlock.hh"
00019 
00020 #define NPS 1000000000LL
00021 
00022 using namespace lcio;
00023 
00024 namespace CALICE {
00025 
00026 class HcalTempModel : public TempModel {
00027 
00028 public: 
00029   HcalTempModel():TempModel(), _firstWarning(true) {};
00030   
00031   virtual ~HcalTempModel() {};
00032   
00033   virtual float getTemp(lcio::LCCollection* col, unsigned moduleID, unsigned CellKey) {
00034     
00035     if (!col) throw std::runtime_error("HcalTempModel::getTemp: invalid collection");
00036     unsigned _chip = (CellKey & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00037     unsigned _channel = CellKey & 0x00FF;
00038     unsigned _module = (moduleID & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00039 
00040 /* some problems in summer 2006 need some fixes: */
00041     lccd::LCCDTimeStamp _timestamp = std::atoll(col->parameters().getStringVal(lccd::DBSINCE).c_str())/NPS;
00042     if (!_timestamp && _firstWarning) {
00043       std::cout << "HcalTempModel: **********************************************************************************************" << std::endl;
00044       std::cout << "HcalTempModel: during on the fly conversion not all fixes for temerature measurements in 2006 can be applied!" << std::endl;
00045       std::cout << "HcalTempModel: **********************************************************************************************" << std::endl;
00046       _firstWarning = false;
00047     }
00048     if (((_timestamp>1153E6) && (_timestamp<1164E6)) || (static_cast<unsigned int>(col->getNumberOfElements())<38)) {
00049 /*  for modules 18, 20, 22 the slow control mapping was wrong, let's take the adjacent modules */             
00050       if ((_module==18)||(_module==20)||(_module==22)) _module++;
00051 /*  for module 21, chip 11 the temperature is a little bit too hot, let's take another module */       
00052       if ((_module==21)&&(_chip==11)) _module=23;
00053 /*  for module 14 the temperature got stuck at some time, let's take another module */
00054       if ((_module==14)&&(_timestamp>1160.5E6)&&(_timestamp<1160.815E6)) _module=15;
00055     }
00056     if (col) {
00057       for (unsigned int imod=0; imod < static_cast<unsigned int>(col->getNumberOfElements()); imod++) {
00058         AhcSlowReadoutModBlock ahcSroModBlock(col->getElementAt(imod)); 
00059         if((unsigned) ahcSroModBlock.getModuleNumber() == _module) {
00060           std::vector<double> cmbTemperatures(ahcSroModBlock.getCmbTemperatures());
00061           /* quite simple assignment of the various cells to the 5 temperature sensors */           
00062           if (_chip == 0) return cmbTemperatures[0];
00063           if ((_chip >= 1) && (_chip <= 3)) return cmbTemperatures[1];
00064           if ((_chip >= 4) && (_chip <= 7)) return cmbTemperatures[2];
00065           if ((_chip >= 8) && (_chip <= 10)) return cmbTemperatures[3];
00066           if (_chip == 11) return cmbTemperatures[4];
00067         }
00068       }
00069     }
00070     std::stringstream message;
00071     message << "HcalTempModel::getTemp: no temperature measurement " << 
00072       "for module " << _module << ", chip " << _chip << ", channel " << _channel <<
00073       "at timestamp " << _timestamp << std::endl;
00074     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00075     return 0;
00076   };
00077   
00078   virtual float getTempError(lcio::LCCollection* col, unsigned moduleID, unsigned CellKey) {
00079 /* assume a precision of 0.1 degrees */
00080     return 0.1;
00081   };
00082   
00083 private: 
00084   bool _firstWarning;
00085   
00086 };
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif
